item.title: How to add shops {508 Bulby}
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

How do I add a shop???

Iâ€™ve got this in npcoption2.java:

if(pnp.npcType == 520) { Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 15); p.shopid = 15; }

This in player.java:

public int[] shop15 = {554, 555, 556, 557, 558, 559, 560, 561, 562, 563, 564, 565, 566};

public int[] shop15 = {554, 555, 556, 557, 558, 559, 560, 561, 562, 563, 564, 565, 566};
public int[] shop15n = {9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000, 9000};

But when i trade npc 520, nothing happens! please help!
